wikipedia_page.main: Glenn Kinsey is a former presenter of Children's ITV, which is the brand name used for the majority of children's television output on ITV in the United Kingdom. He is also a magician. He is now a successful presentation and communication skills coach in the UK.

response: *1991 – Aired on ITV in the UK as part of the Children's ITV Summer Morning programming presented by Glenn Kinsey (TV)
* Glenn Kinsey (Summer mornings 1991, Afternoons December 1991 & December 1992 – 12 February 1993)
